channel.title: Comments on: The Northwest Angle of Minnesota

item.title: By: Andrew James Riemer
item.dc:creator: Andrew James Riemer
item.description: My understanding is that the error was less a result of inaccurate maps, and more a direct result of an inaccurate calculation of the length of the Mississippi River.
item.content:encoded: My understanding is that the error was less a result of inaccurate maps, and more a direct result of an inaccurate calculation of the length of the Mississippi River.
